resources.string:
Big Thanks to:


- stackoverflow.com
- Pascal Cans (noobs.com) for the android-color-picker library
android-color-picker Library @ GitHub

SystemUIAppLauncherSettings is used to customize the 10 Customizable SystemUI Application Launcher.

SystemUIAppLauncherSettings is NOT a standalone-app, you need to apply the mod from the link below:



GUIDE: [GUIDE] Add 10 Customizable App Launcher on SystemUI

BY: 73R3WY@xda

v0.3 \u00A9 2014 73R3WY
